org.qcri.rheem.core.platform

Class CrossPlatformExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.platform.CrossPlatformExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionState

    public class CrossPlatformExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecutionState
    Executes a (cross-platform) ExecutionPlan.
